hero.title: OMAR ELGENDY
hero.description: A financial consultant with over 14 years of experience in accounting, financial management, and strategic decision-making. Holds postgraduate degrees and a master's in Accounting and Decision Support, providing advisory services to a diverse range of holding companies and multi-activity business organizations.
hero.experience: He possesses deep practical experience in the markets of Saudi Arabia, the UAE, and Spain, which gives him a multi-dimensional international perspective to offer innovative financial solutions that align with the regulations and opportunities in each region. He is characterized by a precise analytical approach and a high capacity for designing customized financial strategies, with a focus on improving financial performance, managing risks, and enhancing data-driven decision-making.

features.scheduleFaster: Schedule Your Consultation: Fast & Convenient Scheduling
features.withOmarelgendy: With OMARELGENDY, you can book your consultation in minutes. We ensure a fast and easy scheduling experience, so you can access our advisory services with complete ease and convenience.

services.name: Corporate Financial Consulting
services.description: Comprehensive financial analysis and design of growth and profitability strategies that enhance performance and mitigate financial risks.

services.name: Cash Flow Management and Financial Planning
services.description: Professional planning to control liquidity and ensure short- and long-term financial stability.

services.name: Tax Compliance and International Consulting
services.description: Structuring tax frameworks and handling tax compliance laws in Saudi Arabia, the UAE, and Spain.

services.name: Financial Statement Analysis and Decision-Making
services.description: Preparing analytical reports to accurately understand the financial position and guide strategic decisions.

services.name: Real Estate Investment Consulting
services.description: Providing balanced investment plans that ensure the achievement of passive income in local and international markets.

services.name: Consulting for Expats and International Professionals
services.description: Financial and tax solutions for individuals who work or invest across borders.

services.name: Personal Financial Consulting
services.description: Personal assistance in managing budgets, income, expenses, and savings to achieve future financial goals intelligently and realistically.

cta.schedulingBenefit: OMARELGENDY makes it easy for your clients to schedule a meeting with you.
